FORUM FNE
goals__remit: Representation of all education workers (teachers and non-teachers) of public, private, cooperative and social sectors, of all educational levels, and affiliated partners in the ten unions of FNE, seven trade unions of teachers and three unions of education support employees, covering Continental Portugal, Madeira, Azores and Portuguese Communities Abroad. The activity of FNE covers the social dialogue and collective bargaining, as well as protecting the interests and aspirations of education workers.
